attributes.action: Change the venue for the final of the champions league, if 2 English teams contest it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the recent trouble at Euro matches for the safety of all supporters, I think it would be wise to change the venue for the final of the champions league, if 2 English teams contest it.  Wembley would be one option.  The policing and stewarding is far better in this country.  I am sure the current venue would be compencated in some way if this was to happen.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
